reviews.comment: Awful flashcard that makes me wants to cry just reading it, going throught it was painful, please remove this flashcard from this plane of existence
This flashcard was very helpful in preparing for my exam. The information was clear and concise, and the formatting made it easy to study. I would definitely recommend this flashcard to others!

I found this flashcard to be quite confusing. The information was disorganized and hard to follow. I had to spend a lot of time trying to decipher what the author was trying to say. Overall, not a great study resource.

This flashcard was okay. It had some good information on it, but I didn't find it particularly engaging. The layout was a bit boring, and I didn't feel like I was really learning anything new. It's not terrible, but there are probably better flashcards out there.
I found this flashcard to be really helpful! The information was presented clearly and concisely, and it was easy to remember. Would definitely recommend to others!
This flashcard was okay, but it could use some improvement. Some of the information was unclear and there were a few mistakes. I would still recommend it, but with some reservations.

As a beginner in this subject, I found this flashcard to be really helpful. The information was easy to understand and it was presented in a way that made it easy to remember. The only reason I didn't give it a 5/5 is because I think it could be more comprehensive.
I was really disappointed with this flashcard. The information was presented poorly and it was hard to remember anything. I would not recommend this flashcard to anyone.
